quote: IT'S THE FIIIIIRSSSSTTTTT and you are first in my heart <3
Love is a hard feeling to describe, and I really don't have enough words to do it. But I can tell you this. No one has ever made me feel as comfortable, cared for, and happy as you have.
Our TV show list has gotten too big we really got to knock a few out.
Looking at you is my favorite thing in the world.
One of my favorite moments so far in our relationship was the night you told me you loved me. Your head on my chest, your hands still cold from stargazing, pressed up against me. It was perfect.
If you ever doubt how much I love you, just remember that I willingly ride in a Jeep Gladiator for you.
As soon as you see this I need you to text me name ideas for our cat.
Every time you scratch my head I forget where I am.

One thing that I really love about you is that you always go out of your way to show interest in what I'm doing. You are always asking me about the thing I'm working on, the game I'm playing, or the day I've had, and I think its very sweet.
Date idea: We grab lunch, then find a nice bench somewhere and make up stories for everyone that walks by.
Any time I spend with you is time wll spent. I have never regretted a moment I have been around you.
Just so you know how cool I think you are, I'd rather be spending time with you than building legos.
It is such an honor that I am the one that gets to take care of you.

Well, today is officially the last day until the cycle begins again. I hope you have enjoyed what I have left for you so far, and remember that you can come back at any time to view the current one, even if it is a repeat. Don't worry, I'll let you know whenever I add new ones so you don't miss them. I love you, and I hope this little pile of notes has brought your spirits up a little :)

GUESS WHAT IS BACK AND BETTER THAN EVER! THATS RIGHT, NOT ONLY DO YOU HAVE BOTH YEARS, BUT NOW YOU CAN MOVE AROUND (stuff like this is why I switched to a language I know). But anyways you don't care about the nerd stuff. I just wanted to say that I love you, happy valentines day, and I hope I get to have you as my valentine for the rest of my life. Just like this website, our relationship will continue to change and evolve, but living with you has made me certain that I want to see it through. Is this website as needed now that I can tell you this all myself? Maybe not. But it is always nice for you to have a reminder. - Caleb
Ur the gravy to my biscuits <3 (I'm hungry and thinking about how good your biscuits and gravy are)
Every time I roll over in bed and see you there, I hope that I get to see that view for the rest of my life.
Two years is a long time, but you have made it go by in a second.
Our dumb orange cat will be named tom. No debate. I'm not sorry.
Continuing the worm note from last year, I wanted to say that you have wormed your way into my heart and I won't let you go.
We need to restart game playing. I know it is different living together, but it is still good.
Date idea: We make each get to pick three things we want to do, then we assign them each a number and roll the dice. Then we just do them all anyways.
I don't know exactly where we will live next year, but if it is with you, it's home.
Y'know, I used to think that in love was just something that you were. Being with you has made me realize that it just gets stronger and stronger each day.
You are literally the only person I would watch a several hour minecraft RP video with, and that is saying something.
Pls come find me so I can smooch you
Date idea: We write shitty love songs about each other and then perform them.
You are my little goober and don't you ever forget that.
Did you know that whale sharks have teeth on their eyes? Well now you do.
One day I want to go on a backpacking trip with you so we can run far away from our problems and just stare at the stars together.
Every time you say something hurtful about yourself, I just wish you could see you the way I do. You are so beyond special.
Date idea: We make a little piece of pottery for the other person.
